page.title: 11RECREATION
page.content: {King George V Park}has a slide and swing, a big playing field, tennis courts and bowling greens.{Blackbrook {Club}is for children and adults. On most Mondays there are darts matches. On Tuesdays there are rugby clubs for different age groups. On Thursdays there are discos, and on Saturdays there is a football club and a bar. The{Blackbrook Working Men's Club}is only open on three days. On Tuesdays and Thursdays there are family nights, showing films. On Saturdays there are cartoons and you can play snooker. The Black House{Community Centre}runs Brownies, Morris Dancing, Bodypopping, Judo and Football clubs. It starts at 1800 and ends at 1930 on Thursdays. There is a playgroup for young children and a club for old people, where they can play bingo.
